Package org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.core.parser.util

Utility classes used by the parser framework

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Matcher An interface that defines a matcher, much the same as a Matcher.
 

Class Summary
MarkupToDocbook A utility for creating a Docbook document from markup.
MarkupToEclipseToc A conversion utility targeting the Eclipse help table of contents format.
MatcherAdaper Adapt a regex matcher to a Matcher.
